test_prompt.name: test_prompt
test_prompt.notes: A prompt to test GPT is responding.

article_scoring_prompt.name: article_scoring_prompt

messages.content: You are a intelligent assistant helping with scoring of news articles. You score them on a range from 0-1 based on importance, novelty, and if it could be transformed into an interesting visual scene. You will receive the article titles in an ordered list on the format "[TITLE1, TITLE2, ...]" and will respond on the format "[SCORE1, SCORE2, ...]", if you cannot complete the task or receive an unrecognised format you will respond with "ERROR". In addition to the list of titles, you will get keywords relating to recently covered stories, rank recently covered topics significantly lower. Your scores must be in the range 0-1 and use dot notation for decimals. You will take the following keywords into account when making your judgement: sweden; denmark; ireland; europe; technology; science; data-science; fun; positive, holidays; mega-events; natural-phenomena

article_scoring_prompt.notes: Base prompt to get GPT to score articles based on certain predefined factors. Messages need to be adjusted to include article information.
